name: Guns & Ghouls
description:
Get in line to slaughter an endless horde of ghouls in the most strategic in your face style! Guns & Ghouls is a first person RTS cursor-only shooter featuring a wide selection of TWO, you heard it here first, TWO weapons and a variety of TWO, that's right folks, TWO zombie types!.

Control Scheme

In First Person View
Left Click to shoot.
Middle Button to switch views.
Mouse to look around.
Scroll Wheel to switch weapons.

In Top Down View
Left Mouse Button to snap camera to player.
Right Mouse Button to move player to location.
Middle Mouse Button to switch views.
